plot: An elderly woman seeks the location of a magical pool of water, rumored to allow its visitors the opportunity to go back in time and correct the biggest mistake of their life.
title: The Yesterday Pool
plot_es: An elderly woman seeks the location of a magical pool of water, rumored to allow its visitors the opportunity to go back in time and correct the biggest mistake of their life.
plot_en: An elderly woman seeks the location of a magical pool of water, rumored to allow its visitors the opportunity to go back in time and correct the biggest mistake of their life.
